title: Calories in 8 oz Chicken Breast
meta_description: Discover calories in 8 oz chicken breast, including protein, fat, carbs, full nutrition breakdown per 100 g basis, and easy tweaks for recipes.
assumptions: Skinless, boneless chicken breast, cooked (roasted or grilled), no sauce/oil added; 8 oz ≈ 227 g.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, cut, cooking method, seasoning, water content, and measurement; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: 8 oz cooked, skinless chicken breast has ~374 kcal and ~70 g protein.

label_note: Totals are scaled from the per-100 g basis and mirror Nutrition Facts fields.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tsp olive oil per 100 g
Breaded and fried (vs. grilled) per 100 g

faqs.q: How many calories in 8 oz cooked chicken breast?
faqs.a: About 374 kcal for skinless, boneless, grilled or roasted.

faqs.q: How much protein in 8 oz chicken breast?
Are these values for raw or cooked chicken breast?
faqs.a: Cooked weight; raw would be higher due to water loss during cooking.

faqs.q: What affects calories in chicken breast the most?
faqs.a: Skin, added oils, breading, sauces, and cooking method increase calories significantly.

faqs.q: Calories per 100 g of chicken breast?
faqs.a: ≈165 kcal, 31 g protein, 3.6 g fat, 0 g carbs for cooked skinless.
